title: Ever wondered what's underneath all that armor?
body: Found this while browsing, thought I'd share it.

Soooo, Garen Rumble skin?
What's underneath all that armor? Deeeez Nuuuuts
Garen confirmed a yordle.

Hilarious. A Rioter will say something about this but not the repeated posts about bugs and issues.
On to a more appropriate note....
They need to make skins for heavy armored champs looking casual. Kind of like Leona and Pool Party Leona.
Hilarious that not every singe Rioter works on posts about bugs. Funny, huh?? If only all of them worked on a single thing...

Oh this game is being played, eh? Alright. Note how there are comments on several things from skin concepts they will never make to crap about "what is 9+10?!?!?!?!" (not literal example, but basically it's useless what they comment on)
However, NO word has been giving on the THOUSANDS of bugs reported. And when they "supposedly" said they fixes the firewall bug, people are still having it. I even went to the report a bug section and spent 30 minutes looking through. It was basically vacant of Riot's help. Riot has said nothing on how messed up this patch is, and we have to wait and have waited for an unknown time for them to simply say something so we know that they are aware of these issues.
I've seen this picture online numerous times. Still makes me chuckle every time I see it, though.
